ApplicationBasis.name: Apply incapacitation
ApplicationBasis.hint: Determine when incapacitation trait has an effect on the outcome.
ApplicationBasis.Level: When target is a high level compared to the effect
ApplicationBasis.Trait: When target has a certain trait

RequiredLevelDifference.name: Level difference
RequiredLevelDifference.hint: Set how many levels higher the target needs to be than the effect to trigger the incapacitation effect bonus.

TraitName.name: Trait
TraitName.hint: Set a trait that determines which creatures have a bonus against incapacitation.

SpellEffectLevel.name: Effect level for spells
SpellEffectLevel.hint: Change how effect level is calculated for spells.

IncapacitationEffect.name: Incapacitation effect
IncapacitationEffect.hint: Change how incapacitation affects the outcome of the check.

BonusAmount.name: Bonus value
BonusAmount.hint: When the incapacitation effect is to add a bonus, this value is added.
